Withdrawal fees for some of our assets increased
We’re introducing changes to withdrawal fees for some of the assets at Bitstamp.
BANK HOLIDAY: 11 November 2021 – USD payments paused
Due to the upcoming U.S. holiday on Thursday, 11 November, Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
The overview of your portfolio just got a whole lot more visual

We’re presenting a sleek new run chart of your total portfolio’s value in your account’s dashboard on the web, as well as in the app’s portfolio tab. It gives you an interactive overview of the performance of your crypto assets.
BANK HOLIDAY: 1 November 2021 – SEPA payments paused
Due to the upcoming public holiday on Monday, 1 November 2021, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for all SEPA payments will be closed.
Scheduled downtime on 20 October at 8 AM UTC
All crypto transactions at Bitstamp to halt on 20 October for a maximum of one hour, from 8:00 AM UTC to 9:00 AM UTC at the latest.
BANK HOLIDAY: 11 October 2021 – USD payments paused
Due to the upcoming federal US holiday on Monday, 11 October, Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
Scheduled downtime on 1 October at 8 AM UTC
All crypto transactions to halt on 01 October for a maximum of one hour, from 8:00 AM UTC to 9:00 AM UTC at the latest.
New functionalities in the Bitstamp app v3.0!

The latest version gives you a wholesome overview of your crypto trading at first glance. The new action button provides clear and concise navigation for all your go-to actions in a single tap, while the Market tab makes its first appearance and enables easy browsing among all the assets.
Scheduled maintenance on 22 September at 10 AM UTC
Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, 22 September, beginning at 10 AM UTC.
Want to transfer funds to your Bitstamp account in a jiffy? Try Instant SEPA
If using a credit card is just not your cup of tea, we have a very attractive alternative for depositing funds to your Bitstamp account. It’s extremely fast, simple, and secure; it’s Instant SEPA.
